title: Train fault reported at Pioneer Eastbound

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Trains service is operating normally now.
[EWL] CLEARED: Trains service is running normally now. Please expect an additional of up to 4mins from #Lakeside to #Clementi Eastbound.
[EWL] A train fault has been reported at #Pioneer Eastbound. Trains will be travelling at a slower speed towards #PasirRis.
